thread.title: This Video Shows How 50 NBA Stars Scored the First Baskets of Their Careers
thread.title_full: This Video Shows How 50 NBA Stars Scored the First Baskets of Their Careers | Complex

author: Chris Yuscavage
title: This Video Shows How 50 NBA Stars Scored the First Baskets of Their Careers
text:
Over the course of the next few days, weâ€™re going to see quite a few NBA rookies record the first baskets of their respective careers. Some will be simple layups , while others will feature a much higher degree of difficulty. Either way, t hey will be moments that these players will never forget.
To commemorate the occasion, the NBA put together a video that shows how 50 NBA stars scored their first baskets. Check it out to see Michael Jordan , Kobe Bryant , and others getting their first pro buckets.
Send all complaints, compliments, and tips to sportstips@complex.com .
